title: BBC finds fear, loss and hope in Sudan's ruined capital after army victory
snippets: Our correspondent enters Khartoum just days after Sudan's army recaptured it from the Rapid Support Forces after a six-month offensive.
summary: Sudan's army has successfully recaptured Khartoum from the Rapid Support Forces following a six-month offensive. This development occurred just days before our correspondent entered the city.
titles: BBC finds fear, loss and hope in Sudan's ruined capital after army victory

title: US prosecutors to seek death penalty for Luigi Mangione
snippets: The 26-year-old is accused of shooting dead healthcare CEO Brian Thompson outside a Manhattan hotel.
summary: A 26-year-old individual has been charged with the murder of healthcare CEO Brian Thompson, who was fatally shot outside a hotel in Manhattan.
titles: US prosecutors to seek death penalty for Luigi Mangione

title: France's far right calls for Paris rally in support of Le Pen
snippets: Marine Le Pen has said a "nuclear bomb" was used against her party to stop it getting into power.
summary: Marine Le Pen claimed that extreme measures, described metaphorically as a "nuclear bomb," were employed to prevent her party from gaining power.
titles: France's far right calls for Paris rally in support of Le Pen

title: Putin begins biggest Russian military call-up in years
snippets: Russia calls up 160,000 men aged 18-30 as it moves to expand the size of its military.
summary: Russia has initiated a call-up of 160,000 men aged between 18 and 30 to increase the size of its military forces.
titles: Putin begins biggest Russian military call-up in years

title: At least 322 children killed since Israel's new Gaza offensive, Unicef says
snippets: Since the war began, more than 15,000 children have reportedly been killed, the agency says.
summary: Since the onset of the war, over 15,000 children have been reported dead, according to agency reports.
titles: At least 322 children killed since Israel's new Gaza offensive, Unicef says

title: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis
snippets: Arsenal face a potential injury crisis in defense ahead of their Champions League showdown with Real Madrid after Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber picked up injuries in Tuesday's Premier League win over Fulham.
summary: Arsenal may face challenges in their defense line for the upcoming Champions League match against Real Madrid due to injuries sustained by Gabriel Magalhães and Jurriën Timber during their Premier League victory over Fulham on Tuesday.
titles: Arteta 'worried' by Arsenal's fresh injury crisis

title: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: Capitals star four away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's all-time record
snippets: At his season-long scoring pace, Ovechkin would pass the 'The Great One' in the final game of the season
summary: At his current scoring rate for the season, Ovechkin is projected to surpass Wayne Gretzky's record in the final game of the season.
titles: Alex Ovechkin goals tracker: Capitals star four away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's all-time record

title: Alex Ovechkin scores goal No. 891, moves to within 4 of breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record of 894
snippets: Only Gretzky, Ovechkin and Gordie Howe have scored at least 800 goals in NHL history.
summary: In NHL history, only three players, Wayne Gretzky, Alex Ovechkin, and Gordie Howe, have achieved the milestone of scoring at least 800 goals.
titles: Alex Ovechkin scores goal No. 891, moves to within 4 of breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record of 894

title: Alex Ovechkin scores his 891st career goal. He's just 4 goals away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record
titles: Alex Ovechkin scores his 891st career goal. He's just 4 goals away from breaking Wayne Gretzky's NHL record

title: Everything we heard at NFL league meetings: QB options, draft maneuvers, roster holes
snippets: Annual NFL owners meetings wrapped up Tuesday, and more than 20 of our reporters on the ground had all the buzz from Palm Beach.
summary: The annual NFL owners meetings concluded on Tuesday in Palm Beach, with over 20 reporters providing comprehensive coverage of the event.
titles: Everything we heard at NFL league meetings: QB options, draft maneuvers, roster holes

title: Starmer braced for Trump tariffs as UK seeks better outcome than EU
snippets: Prime minister still hopes to secure a trade deal with the US president
summary: The Prime Minister remains optimistic about reaching a trade agreement with the US President.
titles: Starmer braced for Trump tariffs as UK seeks better outcome than EU

title: EU brandishes ‘strong plan’ to retaliate against US tariffs
snippets: Commission chief Ursula von der Leyen says Brussels could hit Big Tech services exports
summary: Commission Chief Ursula von der Leyen announced that Brussels is considering imposing restrictions on exports of Big Tech services.
titles: EU brandishes ‘strong plan’ to retaliate against US tariffs

title: Investors flock to gold funds as fears over Trump tariffs mount
snippets: Biggest inflow since onset of pandemic pushes bullion to fresh highs as traders hunt for haven assets
summary: Gold prices have reached new highs due to the largest influx of investments since the start of the pandemic. Traders are seeking safe assets, driving up the demand for gold.
titles: Investors flock to gold funds as fears over Trump tariffs mount

title: What price will the UK pay for a trade deal with Donald Trump?
snippets: Sir Keir Starmer may have to make concessions on Britain’s digital services tax and agriculture
summary: Sir Keir Starmer may need to consider adjustments to Britain's digital services tax and agricultural policies.

title: China senses an opportunity in Trump’s cultural revolution
snippets: Policymakers in Beijing believe they will benefit from the destruction of America’s global credibility
summary: Policymakers in Beijing reportedly view the potential decline of America's global credibility as advantageous to their interests.
titles: China senses an opportunity in Trump’s cultural revolution

title: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows
snippets: Mountain snowpacks accumulate snow throughout the winter, building up stores of water that will supply communities across the American West throughout the long dry season. Now, a new study shows that as storms carry snow to the Rocky Mountains, they are also bringing mercury and other contaminants from mines in the region. The research helps scientists understand how contaminants are spread by atmospheric circulation and has implications for snowpack preservation and illuminating the lasting environmental impact of mining activities.
summary: A new study reveals that as snow accumulates in the Rocky Mountains, it brings along mercury and other contaminants from regional mines. This research highlights how atmospheric circulation spreads pollutants and underscores the environmental consequences of mining. It also has implications for the preservation of snowpacks, which are crucial water sources for the American West during dry seasons.
titles: Rocky Mountain snow is contaminated, study shows

title: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans
snippets: For dogs housed at Texas kennels, age and fecal score are important factors for screening for subclinical Giardia infections.
summary: Research indicates that age and fecal score are crucial in identifying subclinical Giardia infections in dogs at Texas kennels, underscoring the need for targeted screening in these environments.
titles: New insight into factors associated with a common disease among dogs and humans

title: Metasurfaces: Bilayer device can control many forms of polarized light
snippets: Researchers have created a bilayer metasurface made of two stacked layers of titanium dioxide nanostructures, opening new possibilities for structuring light.
summary: Researchers have developed a new bilayer metasurface composed of two layers of titanium dioxide nanostructures. This advancement presents new opportunities in manipulating light.
titles: Metasurfaces: Bilayer device can control many forms of polarized light

title: Combination immunotherapy shrank a variety of metastatic gastrointestinal cancers
snippets: A new form of tumor infiltrating lymphocyte (TIL) therapy, a form of personalized cancer immunotherapy, dramatically improved the treatment's effectiveness in patients with metastatic gastrointestinal cancers, according to results of a clinical trial. The findings offer hope that this therapy could be used to treat a variety of solid tumors, which has so far eluded researchers developing cell-based therapies.
summary: A clinical trial has shown that an advanced form of personalized cancer immunotherapy, known as tumor infiltrating lymphocyte (TIL) therapy, significantly enhanced treatment outcomes for patients with metastatic gastrointestinal cancers. This development raises the possibility of using TIL therapy to treat a range of solid tumors, expanding the potential applications of cell-based therapies in oncology.
titles: Combination immunotherapy shrank a variety of metastatic gastrointestinal cancers

title: Surprising number of environmental pollutants in hedgehogs
snippets: Lead, pesticides, brominated flame retardants, plastic additives, polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), and heavy metals. This is what researchers found when they collected dead hedgehogs to investigate the environmental pollutants found in urban environments.
summary: Researchers investigating environmental pollutants in urban areas discovered various contaminants in dead hedgehogs. The substances found include lead, pesticides, brominated flame retardants, plastic additives, polychlorinated biphenyls (PCBs), and heavy metals.
titles: Surprising number of environmental pollutants in hedgehogs
